GitPath: REQUIRED: this is git command path
LocalGitDirectory: REQUIRED: this is your local git directory
BranchName: REQUIRED: this is your branch name
StartTime: REQUIRED: this is start time when searching commits from.
EndTime: OPTIONAL: this is end time when searching commits to.
CompareTool: REQUIRED: this MUST be your compare tool's absolute path.
CompareToolParams: OPTIONAL: this content will be added as command parameters with CompareTool.
